{"id":469041991,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1616002071,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"164 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/469041991/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool is_sqr(long n) {\n        long root = sqrt(n);\n        return root * root == n;\n    }\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        int m = INT_MAX;\n        int dp[n];\n        std::vector<int> squares;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)\n        {\n            int k = i + 1;\n            if(is_sqr(k))\n            {\n                dp[i] = 1;\n                squares.push_back(k);\n            }else\n            {\n                for(int j = 0; j < squares.size() && squares[j] < k; j++)\n                {\n                    m = std::min(m, 1 + dp[k - squares[j] - 1]);\n                }\n            \n                dp[i] = m;\n                m = INT_MAX;\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n - 1];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
